Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to correctional facility visits by the correctional association
Summary: Relates to correctional facility visits by the correctional association; authorizes the correctional association to visit correctional facilities at any time and without advance notice; grants the correctional association access to certain records and information of correctional facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to correctional facility visits by the correctional association
